item.title: Oi
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:6, topic:140722”]I didn’t get a chance to do a proper C&C before, it was 7am and I needed to take a shower before I left for school.

  1. The C4D placement is pretty nice, though the lighting and splatter brushing is a bit off, come to think of it, I don’t see a light source in it. The text is fine, its just how you placed it, I can’t think of a way to explain how to make it better though. You could work on Depth, flow, background, colors, and lighting on this one.

2/3) erm. Work on lighting, flow, blending, depth, lighting, harmony, color, effects, background, and text. I know thats not th ebest thing to say, but this is got to be the worst thing I’ve ever seen you make.

  1. I like the concept and idea of this, it would have looked better if the image wasn’t signature size, but rather a good sized canvas. The rainbow color things on the right, look like their dripping. Which imo is pretty cool. But maybe some more vibrant colors for those instead? The star is a nice little effect, but I can’t figure out the lightening coming from it, that kinda ruined it. The text is over-colored, tone down your clipping mask a bit by putting the opacity to about 75 or so, and it would look better.

  2. This is an interesting one. But there is too much text on it, you want people to look at the picture not the text, but the text in this one draws my attention twords it. The light all around Mario is a bit odd the way its those straight lines, maybe if that light was coming from Mario, it would look a bit better. Other than, the colors could use a bit of work, and other misc. things to make it look better.[/quote]son of a bitch you have time, and like most people said first one is “ok” other ones dont appeal, though gj 7/10

Read full topic

item.title: Oi
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I didn’t get a chance to do a proper C&C before, it was 7am and I needed to take a shower before I left for school.

  1. The C4D placement is pretty nice, though the lighting and splatter brushing is a bit off, come to think of it, I don’t see a light source in it. The text is fine, its just how you placed it, I can’t think of a way to explain how to make it better though. You could work on Depth, flow, background, colors, and lighting on this one.

2/3) erm. Work on lighting, flow, blending, depth, lighting, harmony, color, effects, background, and text. I know thats not th ebest thing to say, but this is got to be the worst thing I’ve ever seen you make.

  1. I like the concept and idea of this, it would have looked better if the image wasn’t signature size, but rather a good sized canvas. The rainbow color things on the right, look like their dripping. Which imo is pretty cool. But maybe some more vibrant colors for those instead? The star is a nice little effect, but I can’t figure out the lightening coming from it, that kinda ruined it. The text is over-colored, tone down your clipping mask a bit by putting the opacity to about 75 or so, and it would look better.

  2. This is an interesting one. But there is too much text on it, you want people to look at the picture not the text, but the text in this one draws my attention twords it. The light all around Mario is a bit odd the way its those straight lines, maybe if that light was coming from Mario, it would look a bit better. Other than, the colors could use a bit of work, and other misc. things to make it look better.

Read full topic
